TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SecurityTokenReferenceStyle extends System.Enum

summary.para: This enumeration sets the desired referencing style that is used to generate security token references (STR) to the security tokens from the signature and encryption elements in the message.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenReferenceStyle External = int32(1)

summary.para: The generated STR will reference the token as if it were not attached to the message itself.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenReferenceStyle Internal = int32(0)

summary.para: The generated STR will reference the token as if it were included in the message.
